# comfyui-custom-nodes-dev

Build, package, document, and safely ship ComfyUI custom node packs. Use when creating or modifying custom nodes in custom_nodes/, defining NODE_CLASS_MAPPINGS, adding JS UI extensions, preparing for Manager distribution, or migrating older nodes to newer schemas.
